    迭代器模式

    前言:简单点说,就是在类中实现迭代器实现对其他类对象的访问

    # 01、迭代器模式

    # -*- ecoding: utf-8 -*-
# @ModuleName: iterartor
# @Mail: 15717163552@163.com
# @Author: mozhouqiu
# @Time: 2022/4/28 15:13
class Demo:
    def __init__(self,car_list):
        self.car_list = car_list
        self.index = 0


    def __iter__(self):
        self.index = -1
        return self

    def __next__(self):
        if self.index <= len(self.car_list):
            self.index += 1
            return self.car_list[self.index]
        else:
            raise StopIteration

class Car:
    def __init__(self):
        pass

a = Demo([Car(),Car()])
iter(a)
print(next(a))
print(next(a))
